title: The One With A Chick. And A Duck

questions.question: What does Monica say is the reason she can't accept the restaurant offer from Pete at first?
options: Because she doesn't think she's a good chef
Because Pete has feelings for her
Because she doesn't like the restaurant's location
Because she's already working at another restaurant
questions.correct_answer: Because Pete has feelings for her
questions.explanation: Monica tells Rachel that Pete's feelings for her are the reason she can't accept the offer.

Because Phoebe suggested it

questions.correct_answer: Because he saw one on TV and thought it was cute
questions.explanation: Joey sees a commercial about baby chicks on TV and decides to buy one.
